version_description: Various bugs squished, tweaks made to improve performance.
Various bugs squished, tweaks made to improve performance.
Various bugs squished, tweaks made to improve performance.

• Discover features you mightn’t have seen before, thanks to our handy new tips
• Learn about our free 24/7 Parcel Lockers and why they’re so awesome
• Fixed an issue where deleting an article caused the screen to freeze

• Discover features you mightn’t have seen before, thanks to our handy new tips
• Learn about our free 24/7 Parcel Lockers and why they’re so awesome
• Fixed an issue where deleting an article caused the screen to freeze

• Discover features you mightn’t have seen before, thanks to our handy new tips
• Learn about our free 24/7 Parcel Lockers and why they’re so awesome
• Fixed an issue where deleting an article caused the screen to freeze

What’s new in this release:

• Push notifications now include estimated delivery dates and locations of parcels awaiting collection
• Streamline Safe Drop requests. You can now set Safe Drop as your default delivery preference
• Save your passwords using Shared Web Credentials
• App improvements and fixes

What’s new in this release:

• Push notifications now include estimated delivery dates and locations of parcels awaiting collection
• Streamline Safe Drop requests. You can now set Safe Drop as your default delivery preference
• Save your passwords using Shared Web Credentials
• App improvements and fixes

What’s new in this release:

• Push notifications now include estimated delivery dates and locations of parcels awaiting collection
• Streamline Safe Drop requests. You can now set Safe Drop as your default delivery preference
• Save your passwords using Shared Web Credentials
• App improvements and fixes

• Find out how 24/7 Parcel Lockers help you get your parcels when and where it suits you – for free
• A new, fresh look
• Stronger help messages
• A nice little touch: the introduction of haptic feedback (iPhone 7 only)
• Various bugs fixed

• Find out how 24/7 Parcel Lockers help you get your parcels when and where it suits you – for free
• A new, fresh look
• Stronger help messages
• A nice little touch: the introduction of haptic feedback (iPhone 7 only)
• Various bugs fixed

• Find out how 24/7 Parcel Lockers help you get your parcels when and where it suits you – for free
• A new, fresh look
• Stronger help messages
• A nice little touch: the introduction of haptic feedback (iPhone 7 only)
• Various bugs fixed

• Better ways to locate and get information on local Post Offices, 24/7 Parcel Lockers and Post Office Boxes.
• Tracking notifications now show the nicknames you give your parcels.
• Various bugs fixed.

• Better ways to locate and get information on local Post Offices, 24/7 Parcel Lockers and Post Office Boxes.

• Various bugs fixed.

• Various bugs fixed.

• Various bugs fixed.
• Various bugs fixed.

• Fixed an issue where some users were seeing an error on launch.
• Stability improvements.

• Fixed an issue where some users were seeing an error on launch.
• Stability improvements.

• Fixed an issue where some users were seeing an error on launch.
• Stability improvements.

• Open Parcel Lockers more quickly by turning on Open Parcel Locker notifications. When you’re near a locker that has a delivery to collect, you'll get a notification with fast locker access.
• Deliveries awaiting collection now include the collection location and hours.
• Various bug fixes and overall improvements.
• Added support for iOS 11.

• Open Parcel Lockers more quickly by turning on Open Parcel Locker notifications. When you’re near a locker that has a delivery to collect, you'll get a notification with fast locker access.
• Deliveries awaiting collection now include the collection location and hours.
• Various bug fixes and overall improvements.
• Added support for iOS 11.

• Open Parcel Lockers more quickly by turning on Open Parcel Locker notifications. When you’re near a locker that has a delivery to collect, you'll get a notification with fast locker access.
• Deliveries awaiting collection now include the collection location and hours.
• Various bug fixes and overall improvements.
• Added support for iOS 11.

• Deliveries containing multiple parcels are now bundled together on your track list instead of being listed separately
• Access details about your delivery even when you’re offline. You’ll see the delivery details that were current when you last viewed them
• Get a more helpful explanation if a tracking number can’t be added to your track list
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Deliveries containing multiple parcels are now bundled together on your track list instead of being listed separately
• Access details about your delivery even when you’re offline. You’ll see the delivery details that were current when you last viewed them
• Get a more helpful explanation if a tracking number can’t be added to your track list
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Deliveries containing multiple parcels are now bundled together on your track list instead of being listed separately
• Access details about your delivery even when you’re offline. You’ll see the delivery details that were current when you last viewed them
• Get a more helpful explanation if a tracking number can’t be added to your track list
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
・Various bugs fixed.
・Various bugs fixed.
・Various bugs fixed.

• More info about delivery options for parcels heading your way. And if an option is unavailable, we’ll explain why
• A quick little demo of how to use our free 24/7 Parcel Lockers
• Added support for iPhone X – track your parcels with that beautiful edge-to-edge display!

• More info about delivery options for parcels heading your way. And if an option is unavailable, we’ll explain why
• A quick little demo of how to use our free 24/7 Parcel Lockers
• Added support for iPhone X – track your parcels with that beautiful edge-to-edge display!

• More info about delivery options for parcels heading your way. And if an option is unavailable, we’ll explain why
• A quick little demo of how to use our free 24/7 Parcel Lockers
• Added support for iPhone X – track your parcels with that beautiful edge-to-edge display!

• A splendid new look for our Safe Drop feature! What’s Safe Drop? When available, you can ask us to leave a delivery in a safe place if nobody’s home to sign
• Plus, for all you Safe Drop fans out there, we’ve made it even easier to “set and forget” it as your delivery preference. Look out for this option next time you request Safe Drop

• A splendid new look for our Safe Drop feature! What’s Safe Drop? When available, you can ask us to leave a delivery in a safe place if nobody’s home to sign
• Plus, for all you Safe Drop fans out there, we’ve made it even easier to “set and forget” it as your delivery preference. Look out for this option next time you request Safe Drop

• Save tracking numbers – now you can save a tracking number that hasn't entered our system yet, so once it's ready it'll be on your list
• Added an ‘In progress’ filter option so you can see all undelivered parcels
• A fresh look for error messages 
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Save tracking numbers – now you can save a tracking number that hasn't entered our system yet, so once it's ready it'll be on your list

• Our Safe Drop delivery option has a fresh name and look; it's now called 'Leave it in a safe place'. What's this delivery option? Ask us to leave eligible parcels in a safe place if nobody’s home to sign
• See how your delivery is tracking with a visual progress bar
• New 'revised' tag makes it easier to see which deliveries have updated delivery dates
• Added a link to your current help and support enquiries
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• New ‘revised’ tag makes it easier to see which deliveries have updated delivery dates

• Protect your information with our new biometric unlock. Tap 'Account' and 'Account details' to turn it on, and use your face or fingerprint to unlock your app
• We've made it easier for you to set a Parcel Collect address by creating a handy animation describing how it works, and making some changes to the language. Parcel Collect lets you use a Post Office as your delivery address to collect where it suits you
• We've overhauled our registration process – it's now quicker and easier to log in or sign up
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• For PO Box customers: You can now see details about any PO Boxes you've leased, if you've added them to your MyPost account

Version 4.9.1:
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Version 4.9:
• Protect your information with our new biometric unlock. Tap 'Account' and 'Account details' to turn it on, and use your face or fingerprint to unlock your app
• We've made it easier for you to set a Parcel Collect address by creating a handy animation describing how it works, and making some changes to the language. Parcel Collect lets you use a Post Office as your delivery address to collect where it suits you
• We've overhauled our registration process – it's now quicker and easier to log in or sign up
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• We've improved how we ask for your mobile number and address. Adding these details helps us to verify your deliveries and automatically add them to your tracking list
• We'll now let you know if we can't redirect your item, so you'll always know when it's still on its way to the previous address
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• We've started a makeover. You'll notice a softer colour scheme, with splashes of our signature red. More to come later...

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Tracked items now show the earliest and the latest date that we expect an item to arrive. As the item gets closer to delivery, we'll narrow down the date so it's easier for you to prepare.
• Also, we've added in-app alerts to keep you across those must-read messages.

Version 5.3.2:
Fixed an issue where the app may freeze or take a long time to launch when not logged-in to your MyPost account.

Version 5.2:
• Dark mode has arrived! See our app in a totally different light.
• Also, we made it easier for you to verify your ID, so you can start using a Parcel Locker or Parcel Collect straight away.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Version 5.3.2:
Fixed an issue where the app may freeze or take a long time to launch when not logged-in to your MyPost account.

Version 5.2:
• Dark mode has arrived! See our app in a totally different light.
• Also, we made it easier for you to verify your ID, so you can start using a Parcel Locker or Parcel Collect straight away.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• We've added a quick-link to current scam alerts – so you can triple-check if you receive an email or SMS which looks a bit phishy.
• Also, for PO Box Plus customers: You can now see your upgraded PO Box addresses, if you've added them to your MyPost account.
• As well as some performance improvements and bug fixes.

• As well as some performance improvements and bug fixes.

• Also, for PO Box Plus customers: You can now see your upgraded PO Box addresses, if you've added them to your MyPost account.
• As well as some performance improvements and bug fixes.

• We've renamed the tracking status 'Your parcel is coming' to 'It's being prepared', because some users told us it was a bit confusing, suggesting the parcel was already on its way.
• For some overseas deliveries, we'll now show a link to the International Carrier once the item has arrived in the destination country, for more detailed tracking.

• We've renamed the tracking status 'Your parcel is coming' to 'It's being prepared', because some users told us it was a bit confusing, suggesting the parcel was already on its way.
• For some overseas deliveries, we'll now show a link to the International Carrier once the item has arrived in the destination country, for more detailed tracking.

• We've renamed the tracking status 'Your parcel is coming' to 'It's being prepared', because some users told us it was a bit confusing, suggesting the parcel was already on its way.
• For some overseas deliveries, we'll now show a link to the International Carrier once the item has arrived in the destination country, for more detailed tracking.
• Created a quick-fix for some Parcel Lockers which aren't scanning. To open a Parcel Locker, easily find your manual access code to collect your item.
• Created a quick-fix for some Parcel Lockers which aren't scanning. To open a Parcel Locker, easily find your manual access code to collect your item.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Parcel arrived but left in limbo on the app? We heard you. If your item has been delivered, but the app still says 'It's on its way' you can now mark the item as 'Delivered'. Note: This is an app-only feature.

• We've also introduced explainers for some key tracking updates, with more info on the status of your item. Find them by tapping the 'Info' icon.

• Parcel arrived but left in limbo on the app? We heard you. If your item has been delivered, but the app still says 'It's on its way' you can now mark the item as 'Delivered'. Note: This is an app-only feature.

• We've also introduced explainers for some key tracking updates, with more info on the status of your item. Find them by tapping the 'Info' icon.

• Can't find your delivered item? See where we left it. Our Posties often take photos of the safe place they've left your delivery. If an image is available, it'll appear with your item details.
• Let us know what you think about the app – you might see the option to give us feedback from time to time.

• Have a PO Box? You can now earn great rewards. Find Post Office Box Rewards next to your PO Box, in the 'Account' section.
• See who's sending your item upfront and centre. We'll show the Sender names on the track list (when we have them).
• And, we made some tiny tweaks to how we display times on tracking history.
